name: CRYPT (itch) (tritex)
description:
CRYPT is an auto runner where movement abilities are plentiful where you venture down an abandoned crypt which will test your abilities.

Arthur Sokolov - Programmer and Musician

Kurie Jones - Main Pixel Artist

Massih Qadare - Logo Designer and Character Artist

Check Out The Music: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCxro3Pb_q-RzYmTjkJzvlmQ

Project had to be finished as it had started to slowly encroach at our school life, so instead of abandoning another project we decided to wrap it up early
